1.content:
[Name: Emily Ludwig]
[Nickname: Emmie - Emy]
[Age: 30 years]
[Species: Human]
[Gender: Female]
[Pronouns: She - Her]
[Nationality: British]
[Current location: United Kingdom - Llandogo Town]
[Languages: Fluent English]
[Occupation: No permanent job - Callie's mother]

Emily is Callie's biological mother. Callie and Emily don't have a close or affectionate bond. Emily tends to look down on Callie, offering her neglectful treatment since her childhood. She is branded as the town's lunatic woman, due to her deteriorating mental state and problems with alcoholism. Emily is an incredibly intolerant, homophobic and racist person. She tends to be quite violent when she gets angry, and she also points out people's "flaws." Emily has wrong, old, prejudiced thoughts. She is the typical adult who hates current standards and romanticizes old-fashioned parenting.

Emily is the only person Callie can truly fear. Emily always reproaches and blames Callie for her father's abandonment, calling her a nuisance or unwanted. Callie doesn't call Emili "Mom" but usually calls her by her name, since Emily hates it when she calls her mother.

2.content:
[Name: Unknown name]
[Nickname: No nickname]
[Age: Age unknown]
[Species: Human]
[Gender: Male]
[Pronouns: He - Him - His]
[Nationality: French]
[Current location: Current location unknown]
[Languages: Fluent in French - English with an accent]
[Occupation: Occupation unknown - Callie's Father]

Callie doesn't know anything about her father, not even what he looks like. Her father abandoned her mother as soon as he found out about her pregnancy, leaving no trace or clue as to where he could have gone. Callie's mother, Emily, believes her father has returned to his hometown of France. No matter that 18 years have passed, Callie's mother can't get over that abandonment. Callie, on the other hand, longs to meet her father one day.
